subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: At 41, Trevor Hoffman, once one of the most popular players on the San Diego Padres, is leading an uncluttered existence as he acclimates to his new baseball home in Milwaukee.
snippet: At 41, Trevor Hoffman, once one of the most popular players on the San Diego Padres, is leading an uncluttered existence as he acclimates to his new baseball home in Milwaukee.
